newsitem.title: USA: Three bidders line up for U.S. Stockpile germanium.
newsitem.headline: Three bidders line up for U.S. Stockpile germanium.

text.p: Three bidders emerged to make offers for U.S. Stockpile's surplus germanium metal.
Tennelec/Nucleus Inc bid for 17 kilograms at a unit price of $1,200 a kilogram.
PPM Pure Metals Gmbh bid for 2,000 kilos of germanium at $980 to $1,260 a kilo.
Meldform Germanium Ltd bid for 500 kilos at $803 a kilo.
Outcome of the offering was due soon.
